üöÄ Exciting Announcement Alert! üöÄ üîß Dive into the realm of innovation and creativity at the University of Bath Engineering Design and Project Exhibition 2024! üîß üìÖ Date: 29/05/2024 üïí Time: 9am - 4.30pm üìç Location: University of Bath Faculty of Engineering & Design Get ready to witness the culmination of months of hard work, dedication, and ingenuity as our talented students showcase their cutting-edge projects and groundbreaking designs. From sustainable technologies to revolutionary prototypes, this exhibition promises to inspire and captivate! Join us for a day of exploration, networking, and celebration as we highlight the brilliance and potential of our future engineers. Whether you are a seasoned industry professional or a curious enthusiast, this event offers a unique opportunity to engage with the latest advancements in engineering and design. Register now to secure your spot: https://lnkd.in/eG84mz5p Don't miss out on this chance to witness the future of engineering unfold before your eyes. Mark your calendars and spread the word! Let's ignite innovation and pave the way for a brighter tomorrow, together. See you there! üî• #Engineering #Design #Innovation #UniversityofBath #ProjectExhibition #FutureLeaders #Networking #Technology

We are incredibly proud to announce that our PowerBox, the cornerstone to the TIER Energy Network (T.E.N.), has been awarded yet another prestigious award. This time as a 2021 German Innovation Winner in the Business to Business category! Thank you, Rat f√ºr Formgebung - German Design Council, for recognizing our ongoing efforts to help boost local economies and to create a more sustainable tomorrow. Thanks for not only praising our TIER Energy Network for enabling "a new era for micro-mobility" but for also acknowledging our PowerBox for having the potential to be "the future of the petrol station." We will continue to reshape our cities with even more sustainable e-mobility innovations and grow the TIER Energy Network by introducing our free and easy-to-use PowerBoxes to more markets across Europe. For anyone who wants to know a little more about the thought process and how our PowerBox came to be, check out our blog article here: https://lnkd.in/eUpKC_i And for all potential hosts who want to help boost their city‚Äôs local economy while contributing to a more sustainable future, can follow the link to register as a T.E.N. partner https://lnkd.in/exxf4Wf #ChangeMobilityForGood #innovation #awardwinning
